name: Cycle Wala
des: A complete IT enable service where you can buy different types of cycle.
fulldes: User can order cycle and give a review for each cycle. Register user with email, password and Google sign in option with firebase auth. Well managed dashboard for both admin and user with customizable service.

name: Khana Food Delivery
des: A full-stack Food Delivery Service for order food by different category.
fulldes: Login via Google sign in option with firebase authentication. Login for see food details with different types of restaurant and order food.User panel for see orders information and cancel order.

name: Deeba Care Center
des: This project is healthcare related website for see doctor’s details and make appointment
fulldes: Register user with email, password and Google sign in with firebase authentication.If a user logged in user see doctor’s details and shop health related product.A responsive website for both desktop and mobile device.

name: Beacon IT
des: This project is educational website for valuable course.
fulldes: Register user with Google sign in with firebase authentication.If a user logged in user buy courses.

name: Shopping Store
des: This project is shopping related website for cart a product. Html, CSS, JS, Netlify
fulldes: User cart different types of product for shopping and see cart total.
